title: Malzahar suppress not supressing
body: Twice in maybe 5 games I have had the same situation occur. Jax begins his stun animation, I (Malzahar) ult (Suppress) him. Jax, although suppressed continues his stun animation and stops my ult. Suppress, by definition, should not only stop whatever a champion is doing but it should also stop the outcome of that action as well.

replies.body: Malzahar's suppress is not working against melee autoattacks at all.
Or ulting a zac mid ult and he keeps going....

That's not a bug. Jax's stun is like Garen's E or Wukong's ult, no matter what, so long as they don't die, the spell can't be stopped by stun, displacement, suppression or anything. Even zhonyas won't stop it.

It's just the nature of those spells.
